Plot: When Simon catches the eye of the prettiest girl at the bar, he must find the courage to approach her. Once he starts down that path, nothing will stop him, even if love is unexpected and scary.
Title: Blush
Writer: Corey Kloos (story), Corey Kloos, Corey Kloos, Uma Teesdale (contributing writer)
Actors: Uma Teesdale, James Barry, Katie Barton Hope, Scott Moreau
